meta.content: Technology; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of picture caption with E-Commerce Report column on Sept 26

block.p: A picture caption with the E-Commerce Report column in Business Day on Monday referred imprecisely to the relationship between ABC News and an Internet company, ScreamingMedia. The ABC Web site, ABCNews.com, provides the text of its online reports to ScreamingMedia, which then distributes them to other Web sites. It does not currently provide video images with the reports.

A picture caption with the E-Commerce Report column in Business Day on Monday referred imprecisely to the relationship between ABC News and an Internet company, ScreamingMedia.
